com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages

Class ScrollFlowPanel

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class ScrollFlowPanel
extends FlowPanel
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band scrollable auto-arranging container layout element

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScrollFlowPanel

        public ScrollFlowPanel(int originX,
               int originY,
               int width,
               int height)

        Constructor that sets the bounds of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this container layout
        height - The value to set as the height of this container layout

      • ScrollFlowPanel

        public ScrollFlowPanel(int originX,
               int originY,
               int width,
               int height,
               FlowPanelOrientation orientation,
               PageElement... elements)
        Constructor that sets the bounds of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout, sets its orientation, and adds layout element children
        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this container layout
        height - The value to set as the height of this container layout
        orientation - FlowPanelOrientation to set as the orientation of this auto-arranging container layout
        elements - layout elements to add as children to this container layout

      • ScrollFlowPanel

        public ScrollFlowPanel(int originX,
               int originY,
               int width,
               int height,
               PageElement... elements)

        Constructor that sets the bounds of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout and adds layout element children

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this container layout (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this container layout
        height - The value to set as the height of this container layout
        elements - layout elements to add as children to this container layout

        Constructor that sets the bounds of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Parameters:
        bound - PageRect object for setting the bounds of this container layout

               PageElement... elements)

        Default orientation is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Parameters:

        elements - layout elements to add as children to this container layout

    • Method Detail

      • getScrollBarColor

        public int getScrollBarColor()

        Method to get the explicit scrollbar color of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element

        Only useful if the color source is set to ElementColorSource.CUSTOM

        The alpha value of the set color will be ignored and any returned color will always have an alpha of 0xff

        Returns:
        The explicit scrollbar color of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element

      • getScrollBarColorSource

        public ElementColorSource getScrollBarColorSource()
        Method to get the scrollbar color source of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element
        Returns:
        The scrollbar color source of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element

      • setFlowPanelOrientation

        public ScrollFlowPanel setFlowPanelOrientation(FlowPanelOrientation orientation)

        Method to set the orientation of this auto-arranging container layout element

        Default is FlowPanelOrientation.VERTICAL

        Overrides:
        setFlowPanelOrientation in class FlowPanel
        Parameters:
        orientation - FlowPanelOrientation to set as the orientation of this auto-arranging container layout element
        Returns:
        this

      • setScrollBarColor

        public ScrollFlowPanel setScrollBarColor(int color)

        Method to set the explicit scrollbar color of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element

        Automatically sets the color source to ElementColorSource.CUSTOM

        Default explicit background color is Color.WHITE

        The alpha value of the set color will be ignored and any returned color will always have an alpha of 0xff

        Parameters:
        color - Color to set as the explicit scrollbar color of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element
        Returns:
        this

      • setScrollBarColorSource

        public ScrollFlowPanel setScrollBarColorSource(ElementColorSource colorSource)

        Method to set the scrollbar color source of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element

        If set to ElementColorSource.CUSTOM, an explicit background color must be provided

        Default is ElementColorSource.CUSTOM with the explicit scrollbar color set as Color.WHITE

        Parameters:
        colorSource - ElementColorSource to set as the scrollbar color source of this scrollable auto-arranging container layout element
        Returns:
        this
